definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Mr. Kallasvuo said maps and navigation will be at the heart of the company's connection services.
sentences.chinese: 康培凯说，地图和导航将是公司连接服务的核心。

sentences.english: We spread the map out on the table.
sentences.chinese: 我们把地图展开铺在桌子上。

sentences.english: It is possible to trim off any blank area after printing.
sentences.chinese: 地图印刷完毕后，可将空白部分裁切掉。

sentences.english: Barbarian can hop across gaps on the map.
sentences.chinese: 他可以跳过地图上的烈风峡谷之类障碍。

sentences.english: Fixed not being able to escape from map editor menus after applying options.
sentences.chinese: 固定不能够逃脱地图编辑器菜单后应用选项。

sentences.english: Can you show me where I am in this map?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我我现在处于地图上的哪个位置吗？

sentences.english: Your Homestay should also give you a map and tell you how to get to the college.
sentences.chinese: 寄宿家庭也会给你一张地图并告诉你怎么样去学校。

sentences.english: Heatmaps and overlays quickly provide perspective into user behavior and habits.
sentences.chinese: 还可以根据用户行为与习惯生成热点地图与覆盖图。

sentences.english: The research of automatic cartographic generalization is a very difficult subject.
sentences.chinese: 数字地图自动综合的研究是一个非常艰难的课题。

sentences.english: We have five classes; therefore, we need five maps.
sentences.chinese: 我们一共有五个班，需要五张地图。

sentences.english: But, Hu said his company's chips do not contain the maps, which were put at the government's printing facilities.
sentences.chinese: 但胡称，公司的芯片未包含这张政府用于印刷的地图。

sentences.english: The map theory has at least two advantages over the Picture theory.
sentences.chinese: 相对于图像论而言，语言地图说至少有两个优点。

sentences.english: No, you can see them by poking around Google Maps .
sentences.chinese: 不，你可以看到他们的洪学智就是围绕谷歌地图。

sentences.english: You might even try to draw your own map from a "birds-eye view" perspective.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以尝试从“鸟瞰”的角度形成自己的地图。

sentences.english: The systems deliver moving maps and other information via cockpit displays.
sentences.chinese: 该系统通过座舱显示器提供移动地图和其他资料。

sentences.english: So you can use it on your maps as well.
sentences.chinese: 所以你也可以将它用在你的地图上了。

definition: sand table (military)/3D terrain (or site) model (for real estate marketing, geography class etc)/sand tray (on which to write characters)
